**Linguala** now works with **automatic real-time translation** - clean and simple. As soon as you type, it translates automatically with an 800ms debounce (waits for you to pause typing). 

The interface is now even cleaner:
- âœ… No confusing toggle switches

Much better UX - users expect translation to happen automatically, just like Google Translate! ðŸš€
